snippet: Interior Ministry figures show an 11.2 percent overall increase of crimes carried out for political or ideological reasons across Germany.
abstract: German Interior Ministry figures show that the number of violent, politically motivated crimes increased by nearly 18 percent in 2011, compared with 2010.
lead_paragraph: Interior Ministry figures show an 11.2 percent overall increase of crimes carried out for political or ideological reasons across Germany.

headline.main: Germany Sees Increase in Crimes With Political or Racist Motives
